text: Carlos Austin Boozer Jr. (born November 20, 1981 in Aschaffenburg, West Germany) is a former American basketball player. During his NBA career, he played for the Cleveland Cavaliers, Utah Jazz, Chicago Bulls and Los Angeles Lakers. His nicknames are Booz, CBooz, and Booz Cruise. He won a gold medal with Team USA in the 2008 Summer Olympics Games in Beijing and is a two-time NBA all-star in 2007 and 2008. Boozer was drafted out of Duke University by the Cleveland Cavaliers and played with them in the 2002-03 and 2003-04 NBA seasons. Boozer was known to yell, "Gimme that!" when he got a rebound. ==Other websites== * Carlos Boozer Info Page at NBA.com Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:African- American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Cleveland Cavaliers players Category:Los Angeles Lakers players Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:People from Juneau, Alaska Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Alaska Category:Utah Jazz players
title: Carlos Boozer
